CustomField.formula: ROUND(New_CostPrice__c, IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Assortment_BU__r.CostPrice_Rounding_Level__c)), 4, VALUE(TEXT(Assortment_BU__r.CostPrice_Rounding_Level__c)))) -(IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P1/'), 0, New_Disc_1_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P2/'), 0, New_Disc_2_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P3/'), 0, New_Disc_3_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P4/'), 0, New_Disc_4_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P5/'), 0, New_Disc_5_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P6/'), 0, New_Disc_6_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P7/'), 0, New_Disc_7_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P8/'), 0, New_Disc_8_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P9/'), 0, New_Disc_9_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P10/'), 0, New_Disc_10_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P11/'), 0, New_Disc_11_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P12/'), 0, New_Disc_12_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P13/'), 0, New_Disc_13_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P14/'), 0, New_Disc_14_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P15/'), 0, New_Disc_15_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P16/'), 0, New_Disc_16_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P17/'), 0, New_Disc_17_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P18/'), 0, New_Disc_18_Val__c) + IF(CONTAINS(New_Promo_Discounts__c, 'P19/'), 0, New_Disc_19_Val__c))
CustomField.label: New NetPrice wo Promo woTax
